text:
OS : HP-UX B.11.31 U ia64

svn add .
svn commit "adding more than 65 files"

Error : 

Transmitting file data .................................................................svn: E000002: Commit failed (details follow):
svn: E000002: Can't create temporary file from template '/tmp/svn-XXXXXX': No such file or directory

Same issue :
http://subversion.1072662.n5.nabble.com/Bug-svn-E000002-Can-t-create-temporary-file-from-template-tmp-svn-XXXXXX-No-such-file-or-directory-td173623.html

$>: /usr/sbin/swlist|grep apr
apr                           1.4.8          apr
apr_util                      1.5.2          apr_util
subversion                    1.8.3          subversion

Package from : http://hpux.connect.org.uk/hppd/cgi-bin/search?term=subversion.
creator: mornik@gmail.com
